#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int N=200001;
int long heights[N];
#define LL int long long
LL dp[N];
int main()
{
	int n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	int i,j;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
	scanf("%d",&heights[i]);
	dp[i]=(1LL<<60LL);
	}
	dp[n]=(1LL<<60LL);
	dp[0]=0;
    for(i=1;i<n;i++)
    {
      for(j=1;(i-j)>=0;j<<=1)
      {
      dp[i]=min(dp[i],dp[i-j]+abs(heights[i]-heights[i-j]));
      }
    }
    printf("%lld\n",dp[n-1]);
    return 0;
}
